articles.title: Back-to-back CME hits can bring INTENSE solar storm to Earth today; Blackouts to GPS disruption, Know what to expect - HT Tech
articles.description: Forecasters have predicted that at least two CME clouds are going to hit the Earth today, April 21. This event can bring a dangerous solar storm to Earth as the overall magnetic charge doubles over.
